page.title: 20DOMESDAY GROUP BISHOPBRIGGS
page.content: The information collected in the Domesday Block centred on Bishopbriggs was a joint effort on the part of 4 schools in the area. Of the text pages, pages 2-6 were the work of Wester Cleddens Primary School, pages 7-11 were written by St. Matthews Primary School, Meadowburn Primary School wrote pages 12-15, and Turnbull High School were responsible for the others as well as acting as the final co-ordinating group for the collation and onward transmission of the collected data. Each school was allocated 3 Grid Squares for data collection which was then transcribed onto the final submission in Turnbull High School. Photographs A and C were taken by pupils at Wester Cleddens P.S. and Photos B and D were taken by St. Matthews' pupils.
